herregardssingel.name: Manor Gravel
herregardssingel.longDescription:
Why choose Manor Gravel:

- When you want an outdoor area with character.
(Light beige when the gravel is dry and brown when it is wet.)

- Manor Gravel is a good and more affordable alternative to Danish beach and river gravel.

- Manor Gravel is also more stable as the stones are crushed and not round.

- Manor Gravel does not get as easily contaminated by green algae and fungus as white gravel does.

- Exclusive gravel with a unique light brown/beige color.

herregardsgrus.name: Manor Crushed Stone
herregardsgrus.description: When aesthetics and functionality play a role.
herregardsgrus.longDescription:
If you want a firmer surface in yards or driveways, Manor Crushed Stone is a good alternative to gravel. Because it contains 'zero-substance', it compacts very well. And you get the same fine light brown/beige color as when using Manor Gravel. Brightens up the outdoor area and is aesthetically much finer than when using ordinary gray gravel.

For larger quantities, the gravel can be sold in bulk.

Pickup price Aksdal: 300kr incl. VAT per ton.
Pickup price Holmefjord: 900kr incl. VAT per ton.

grus.name: Crushed Stone
grus.description: Natural crushed stone in various fractions. Perfect for foundations, drainage, or roads.
grus.longDescription: Our crushed stone is natural stone that is excellent for a variety of purposes. Produced from local natural stone and sorted into different fractions to meet your needs. Ideal for foundations, drainage, roads, and civil engineering. Delivered in Big Bags of 900kg.

elvestein.name: River Stone
elvestein.longDescription: Natural rounded stones from local sources. Size is approx. 60-150mm. Perfect for decoration in the garden, around the house, or in flower beds.

sand.name: Sand
sand.description: Pure sand with a nice light brown/beige color
sand.longDescription: Pure sand with a nice light brown/beige color that can be used for sandboxes, lawn topdressing, and masonry sand.

singelmatter-eccogravel.name: Gravel Mats ECCOgravel
singelmatter-eccogravel.description: Gravel stabilization mats (120x100 cm). Prevents tracks and weeds.
singelmatter-eccogravel.longDescription:
ECCOgravel stabilization mats make it possible to have a gravel surface as firm and stable as asphalt. Perfect for driveways, parking lots, and walkways where you want a natural look without wheels or feet sinking in.

Why choose ECCOgravel:
- **Full stability:** Prevents track formation and makes it easy to cycle or push a stroller.
- **Integrated membrane:** Comes with a pre-glued weed membrane (80 g/m¬≤) that allows water through while stopping weeds.
- **Easy installation:** The 120x100 cm plates are easy to adjust with a saw or angle grinder.
- **Sustainable:** Produced from recycled plastic and is itself 100% recyclable.
- **Heavy duty:** When filled, the mats can withstand cars and heavier vehicles.

Technical specifications:
- Plate format: 120 x 100 x 3 cm (1.2 m¬≤ per plate).
- Gravel consumption: approx. 75 kg per m¬≤.
- Recommended gravel size: 5 ‚Äì 25 mm.

Price is per square meter.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.text: This purchase is governed by the standard sales conditions below for consumer purchases of goods over the internet. Consumer purchases over the internet are mainly regulated by the Contract Act, the Consumer Purchases Act, the Marketing Act, the Right of Withdrawal Act, and the E-commerce Act, and these laws give the consumer inalienable rights. The terms of this agreement should not be understood as any limitation on the statutory rights, but establish the parties' most important rights and obligations for the trade.

agreement.title: 1. The Agreement
agreement.text: The agreement consists of these sales terms, information provided in the ordering solution, and any specifically agreed terms. In case of any conflict between the information, what is specifically agreed between the parties prevails, provided it does not contradict mandatory legislation.

parties.title: 2. The Parties
parties.buyerText: The consumer who makes the order, hereinafter referred to as ¬´buyer¬ª or ¬´you¬ª.

price.title: 3. Price
price.text: The specified price for the item and services is the total price the buyer shall pay. This price includes all taxes and value-added tax. Additional costs that the seller has not informed about before the purchase shall not be borne by the buyer.

formation.title: 4. Contract Formation
formation.text: The agreement is binding for both parties when the buyer has sent their order to the seller.

payment.title: 5. Payment
payment.text: The seller can demand payment for the item from the time it is sent from the seller to the buyer. If the buyer uses a credit card or debit card for payment, the seller can reserve the purchase price on the card upon ordering. The card is charged on the same day the item is sent.
payment.methods: We offer payment with Vipps and card payment (Stripe).

delivery.title: 6. Delivery
delivery.text: Delivery has occurred when the buyer, or their representative, has taken possession of the item.
delivery.pickup: Pickup: Can be done by appointment at Matland G√•rd.
delivery.shipping: Delivery: We offer delivery in specified zones (Bergen/Surroundings) for a shipping fee. Delivery time is agreed upon separately.

withdrawal.title: 7. Right of Withdrawal
withdrawal.text1: The buyer can withdraw from the purchase of the item under the Right of Withdrawal Act. The buyer must notify the seller of use of the right of withdrawal within 14 days after the period began to run. The period includes all calendar days. If the period ends on a Saturday, public holiday, or day of rest, the period is extended to the nearest working day.
withdrawal.text2: When using the right of withdrawal, the item must be returned to the seller without undue delay and at the latest 14 days after notification of use of the right of withdrawal is given. The buyer covers the direct costs of returning the item.
withdrawal.exception: Exception: For delivery of bulk materials (shingle, gravel, soil) that have been tipped off and mixed with other masses, or which by nature cannot be returned, the right of withdrawal lapses upon delivery.

complaints.title: 8. Complaints in Case of Defect and Deadline for Reporting Claims Due to Delay
complaints.text: If there is a defect in the item, the buyer must within a reasonable time after it was discovered or should have been discovered, notify the seller that they will invoke the defect. The buyer has always complained on time if it happens within 2 months from the time the defect was discovered or should have been discovered. Complaints can occur at the latest two years after the buyer took over the item.

conflicts.title: 9. Conflict Resolution
conflicts.text: Complaints are directed to the seller within a reasonable time. The parties shall attempt to resolve any disputes amicably. If this does not succeed, the buyer can contact the Consumer Authority for mediation.
